attributes.action: Reintroduce the Ten Percent Tax Rate for low paid workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the disgraceful decision by the Chancellor of the Exchequer to remove the 10% tax rate, affecting 100's of thousands of low paid workers and pensioners,who cannot claim Tax Credits because they are single etc, are now worse off. Why should the lowest earners be worse off? Vote here now to put back the 10% or show you disapproval by voting New Labour and Gordon out of office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
